sub_title: Software Engineer with focus on Web Development. I'm currently not open for a new job!
summary:
Software Engineer, regardless of the language or platform, always worried about the code quality and delivering value to the customer.

Recently I've been working as a Full-Stack developer mainly with Javascript, React, and Docker.

I also had the opportunity to work as Lead Software Engineer, a role that helped me to develop skills such as emotional intelligence, leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.

education.degree_name: Pós-Graduação em Desenvolvimento de Sistemas para Web

courses.name: Core Web Application Technologies With Microsoft Visual Studio 2005.
Domain-Driven Design e development best practices

company.name: Textkernel - Machine Intelligence for People and Jobs

profile_positions.description:
Development and maintenance of Javascript and React applications.

Key Responsibilities
• Front-end development of several applications and internal tools
• Helping splitting up a monolithic application into smaller ones 
• Maintaining admin interfaces using ReactJs + Reflux
• Creating and maintaining software documentation used by other internal teams
• Providing support to other internal teams 

Technical Environment
• Linux
• Javascript, ReactJs, Redux, RequireJs, RefluxJs
• Docker
• Test automation with Selenium (Groovy, Spock)
• Git
• PostgreSQL
• Python 
• Neo4J
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
NodeJs APIs development and Web Apps using ReactJs + Redux. I am also in touch with Docker, Elasticsearch, IoT and AWS (Amazon Web Services), which are part of the current project stack.

Key Responsibilities
• Implementing RESTFul services using NodeJs
• Coding Web Mobile apps using ReactJs + Redux
• Understanding and analyzing customer requirements
• Breaking customer requirements into development tasks

Technical Environment
• Linux
• NodeJs, Express, Mocha
• ReactJs + Redux
• Docker
• AWS
• Git
• Mongo, MySQL, SQLServer, Elasticsearch
profile_positions.title: Full-Stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
As lead software engineer at Bravi I've been working in a distributed team as a developer where I'm also responsible for mentoring and helping the team to improve the product and to improve themselves.

I'm currently involved in a large scale educational project called EBS. This product is powered by the English company Tribal Group. This project involves five different offices around the world (Brazil, Australia, New Zealand and 2 in the UK) and it is delivered to 4 different countries (England, Wales, Australia and New Zealand.

Key Responsibilities
• Implementing new features and fixing bugs using Microsoft .NET platform
• Managing the work of Junior developers
• Reviewing other developers code
• Understanding user stories and splitting into working tasks
• Planning and estimating the work to be done
• Attending and organizing scrum ceremonies
• Performing one to one meetings and appraisals
• Organizing technical workshops
• Performing technical interviews

Technical environment
• C#, ASP.NET Web Forms, WPF, Windows Workflow Foundation, Reporting Services
• Source control using TFS
• Oracle, SQL Server
• Web Technologies such as HTML, Jasvacript, CSS, Rest Services
• Patterns and practices like automated unit testing, OOP, TDD, MVVM, MVC, Scrum
profile_positions.title: Lead Software Engineer
